summary: A test suite that exercises various EC2 subnet operations using a mocked AWS environment. It covers creation, description, tagging, CIDR handling, availability zones, IP address allocation, attribute modification, and association/disassociation of CIDR blocks, verifying that the boto3 client behaves as expected.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of EC2 subnet management features in the application, ensuring that subnet-related API calls function properly and regressions are caught during development.
